info.title: Himalayan Yoga API
info.description: API documentation for Himalayan Yoga application

200.description: Login successful - Token is set as HTTP-only cookie

image.description: Image file (jpeg, jpg, png, gif, webp, max 5MB)
Image file (jpeg, jpg, png, gif, webp, max 5MB) - optional for update

image.description: Image file (jpeg, jpg, png, gif, webp, max 5MB)

post.summary: Submit a new review (also stored as a lead)

message.example: Review created successfully and stored as lead

ids.description: Array of review IDs to delete

get.summary: Get publishable reviews (latest 3 approved reviews) - Public endpoint

description.example: Traditional yoga practice focusing on physical postures

images.description: Multiple image files (jpeg, jpg, png, gif, webp, max 5MB each)

The new password confirmation does not match.

bearerAuth.description: Enter your Bearer token in the format: Bearer {token}
